channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: Model anti-abortion legislation would have forced 10-year-old rape victim to carry to term, author says. https://t.co/XMlwvzDu4u
Texas’ fragile grid isn’t ready for crypto mining’s explosive growth. https://t.co/VCYyrb5VjD
Paul Begala is an especially detestable pundit. https://t.co/627ajxNHKE

I think the person who runs Twitter should have a sense of humor and love good entertainment. There's so much potential in this medium, that's just been left there for everyone to figure out. Which is great, except there's been little or no coordination with the tech.
It might be too late for that approach. A better one might be to see Twitter as something like a Roku with 100 percent market share.
So we want to put together apps that run on their desktop. The apps can do everything Twitter can do, and whatever else the apps think of.
@howardweaver no doubt. i wonder why people get so excited about what deals the knicks should do or not do. they get really excited about it.
@matageli @HC_Richardson yes i understood that's what she was saying.

@HC_Richardson It's the frontier of politics. How long are the people supposed to wait for the Democrats to stand up to the insurrection? They have no ability to communicate effectively, where the Repubs have mastered it. Someone has to fill the vacuum.

@TaylorLorenz This is how new political parties are going to boot up. The political influencers should hook up with really first rate systems developers and then we will be on the way to getting to the next level of politics, which we desperately need to do.

Someday people on twitter will talk about who owns twitter (this week) the way knicks fans discuss whether they should trade for donovan mitchell. ;-)
BTW -- is it a coincidence that @ev stepped aside at @medium as Twitter, which he co-founded, is without a leader?
Should Twitter bring back the Fail Whale?
@mathewi I think they should bring it back and give it a new name - "Elon"
Welcome to Our Startup Where Everyone is 23 Years Old Because We Believe Old People Are Visually Displeasing and Out of Ideas. https://t.co/OjiZvK0d36
Book Review: ‘Frida in America’ and ‘Frida Kahlo and San Francisco’. https://t.co/zIFHOt6Eil
Readybot: automatic Discord RSS & news bot. #twowayRSS https://t.co/nl7GaojYeP
How Bill Gates spends money. https://t.co/diU86P3A3R
It just occurred to me that the way I collect domains is like an NFT, and wondered if the markets they use for NFTs would work better for buying and selling domains.
@acookiecrumbles ask me any time, i might've missed your tweet. ;-)

@acookiecrumbles simply support the standard and develop whatever features you want outside of the standard. i don't see the problem. i tried to understand what his point was and i didn't get it. spotify is doing a lot of damage to podcasting by calling things podcasts that aren't podcasts.
Berkeley animal shelter is overcrowded with cats. https://t.co/Ouw6O9zoY5
The world-famous Texas good guys with guns were scared shitless. https://t.co/eqpKAB3fwP
@brandontoner exactly. put it in the wrong place and revel in it. (don't feel bad we all do this.)

@brandontoner heh yes that's true. i really want the info. few of us know each other, the developers of these tools. i think the users have to take charge. i did part of the job by putting together a list of apps that support OPML. https://t.co/1JXirgN3Hv
